programme.desc: Nottingham Forest v Manchester City (Kick-off 12.30pm). All the action from the match at The City Ground. Forest claimed a 1-0 win here in last season's corresponding fixture thanks to Callum Hudson-Odoi's 83rd-minute strike, and they will be looking to emulate that outcome against a City side that are hoping to challenge for the title but have suffered several defeats on their travels this term.

programme.title: The Strange Beast Of Silent Island
The Strange Snake Story In Shangtong Village
Detective Dee And The Punished Swellhead
The Legend Of Man And Loong
Saving General Yang
programme.desc: Ekin Cheng, Vic Chow, Raymond Lam & Wu Chun, star in this tale that depicts how the seven sons of General Yang set out to rescue their father from an army of thousands.

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Joanna is a suspect of a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. When the police investigates the case, they discover another murder case which leads them to the truth.

programme.title: Table for Six 2
programme.desc: Bernard and Lung plan to get married when their eldest brother is away. Yet, the weddings spiral into a chaotic battleground with escalating family drama, creating a messy affair for all involved!

programme.title: A Legend
programme.desc: An archaeologist uncovers artifacts from a glacier expedition that resembles a jade pendant in his dream, so he leads his team to a fantastical adventure into the glacier to unveil the truth.

programme.title: The Grandmaster
programme.desc: Directed by Wong Kar Wai, this epic action film begins in Foshan when Ip Man defending southern fighting styles against a master of the North, Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: When Fleur join her university's hip hop team, a journey begins which lead her into the heated world of dance competitions and a complicated romance.

programme.title: The Last Tycoon
programme.desc: Framed and forced to leave all he loves, a grocery clerk ultimately grows into one of Shanghai's most powerful mob bosses. Yet, can he leave the past behind?

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Vanguard, a covert private security, is tasked with protecting an accountant targeted by deadly mercenaries. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: The Movie Emperor
programme.desc: A Hong Kong megastar decides to make a film about rural China to win an award at a film festival. He experiences village life for a farmer's role, but this results in a series of hilarious events.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: An uplifting sports drama focusing on a property agent who leads an aimless, unfulfilling life & his P.E teacher, as they seek to find purpose in their lives.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau 3
programme.desc: The latest sequel to the action-comedy FROM VEGAS to MACAU brings Andy Lau & Jacky Cheung back in a power-packed new tale.

programme.title: Fly Me to the Moon
programme.desc: New Hong Kong immigrants Yuan and her sister face identity crises, poverty and their father's drug addiction. Even as they separate from their father, Yuan finds his traits mirrored in her loved ones.

programme.title: The Monkey King 3
programme.desc: The Queen of Female Kingdom falls in love with Monk Tang, but her advisor orders Monk Tang and his disciples to be killed. As the River Spirit appears, the kingdom is plunged into crisis!

programme.title: An Abandoned Team
programme.desc: Uncle Jia is bad tempered and lives alone. He decides to end his life as he feels hopeless but is saved by a stray dog and an animal welfare volunteer, allowing him to rediscover his purpose in life.

programme.title: The Moon Thieves
programme.desc: A crooked watch dealer gathers a team of thieves to steal three luxury watches in Tokyo. Their plan alters upon finding the legendary 'Moonwatch', leading to a perilous heist amidst a yakuza pursuit.

programme.title: The Way We Talk
programme.desc: Three deaf youthsWolf, Sophie and Alandevelop a profound bond and support each other through sign language. United by love and friendship, they embark on a journey of self-discovery and resilience.

programme.title: Rob N Roll
programme.desc: A ruthless bandit plots a major heist which is joined by two dispirited men inadvertently. Their ad-hoc and dramatic robbery lands them in a fierce police pursuit, putting their lives on the line!

programme.title: The Prosecutor
programme.desc: A young man is wrongly convicted of drug trafficking. A former cop turned prosecutor believes in his innocence and launches an investigation, risking his life and career to find the true perpetrator.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 1900
programme.desc: In 1900s San Francisco, the murder of a white woman in Chinatown ignites public outrage. Two Chinese detectives race against time to uncover the true killer amid mounting tension and danger.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: A mechanic bumps into his dream girl for the second time after making his pile. This time, he just may get to be with her, even if itis only in his dreams.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: After a security engineer unwittingly becomes involved in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Once in a Blue Moon
programme.desc: Mei Zhen's family appears to get along but harbours secrets - she struggles at work, her brother hides his separation and their mother fears her past will affect them. Can they overcome these hurdles?

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong
programme.desc: Ng Shun and his family return to the estate where he grew up after his business has failed. When his family squeeze into the small flat, Ng Shun is forced to face his long-neglected family problems...

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover agent Nick finds himself in a moral dilemma when the time to betray his mentor finally came. Starring Andy Lau, Louis Koo, Daniel Wu and more!

programme.title: Nature Cat Special 2 -The Nature
programme.desc: The Nature-tastic Four feel ready for a well-earned afternoon of fun and relaxation after defeating the Soil, Water and Plant Stealers; an outer space creature comes down to Earth.

Our cooking teams will take turns each episode to transform an ordinary home into an instant restaurant for one pressure-cooker night. They'll be serving up a three-course menu designed to impress not only their fellow contestants, but also our series judges.

In 2015 Mercedes-AMG set out to crack one of the last barriers within the automotive industry: The first street legal Hypercar with F1 Technology. What was supposed to be the ultimate Highlight within the Motorsports Industry soon turned into a nightmare that put the image of the entire Mercedes Group on the spot. Failure was not an option.

Professor Alice Roberts reveals the fascinating world hidden beneath our feet. The United Kingdom has a rich and varied history stretching back thousands of years and hidden below the surface are some amazing treasures, just waiting to be found. programme.title: Klincus 4
programme.desc: Klincus befriends the tiny inhabitants of the treetop village Frondosa in Bosco Grande forest. He protects them from industrialist Graylock's deforestation plans, discovering his abilities while learning life lessons.

programme.desc: Back in the day, dinosaurs ruled the world. Dinomite is one of them and Lucy is his human friend! For this odd couple Dinomites head buzzing with ideas and Lucy full of boundless cave girl energy every day brings new adventure and excitement!

programme.desc: Aesop is a friendly wolf who happens to be the leader of a travelling theater group. Aesop writes and directs the plays, which are performed as they travel from town to town.
